snippet: Were Hertz, Dollar Thrifty, American Airlines and Southwest Airlines right to behave so aggressively toward travel start-ups that point out (and exploit) the travel giants' weaknesses?
abstract: Were Hertz, Dollar Thrifty, American Airlines and Southwest Airlines right to behave so aggressively toward travel start-ups that point out (and exploit) the travel giants' weaknesses?

headline.main: AutoSlash, AwardWallet, MileWise and the Travel Bullies
